I purchased this as a gift for a friend. 

This blush seems to be more geared towards cool-tone people. For warm-tones, I would suggest other colors.

I absolutely love non-shimmery blushes, especially in peach / white-based colors, though this blush doesn't suit me (warm-tone) that well.

My friend loves how this blush makes her look more healthy. This is an everyday blush for my friend.
